data.title: Washington Nationals
data.meta_description: Washington Nationals | 35,246 followers on LinkedIn. 2019 World Series Champions | est. 2005 | The Washington Nationals are a Major League Baseball team based in Washington, D.C. The Nationals are a member of the East Division of MLB’s National League. Nationals Park, located on the Anacostia River in Southeast Washington, was the first Major League Baseball stadium in America to earn the LEED-certified Silver designation by the U.S.
data.text:
This past Monday, we hosted our Nationals Partner Alliance (NPA) at The Cannon Club for our annual Golf Tournament. The day was filled with impactful networking, allowing our partners to engage with each other and develop deeper relationships. Events like these are a testament to the strength and value of our Partner Alliance. Congratulations to representatives from PNC, Toyota, ANC, and Just Ice Tea for walking away as the day’s winners with autographed memorabilia and trophies to commemorate their performance. A special thank you to The Cannon Club and all the participants who made this event a success. #NationalsPartnerAlliance #GolfOuting #Networking #Nationals

Over the weekend, we proudly celebrated the Nationals Youth Baseball Academy Class of 2024 as well as Academy Player Ambassador Josiah Gray, who recently completed his coursework at Le Moyne College. Gray received his diploma and stoles in a surprise pregame ceremony, which also featured congratulatory messages from several well-wishers, including Major League Baseball (MLB) Commissioner Rob Manfred.

Ahead of Memorial Day, Manager Dave Martinez and the Nationals coaching staff expressed their appreciation for the service and sacrifice of our nation's veterans with a visit to the Washington DC VA Medical Center, which serves more than 128,000 enrolled veterans residing in D.C. and areas of Maryland and Virginia.

On this day in 1947, Jackie Robinson made his debut with the Brooklyn Dodgers, breaking MLB's color barrier. His legacy lives on throughout baseball – including at the Nationals Youth Baseball Academy, the signature program of Washington Nationals Philanthropies. Thank you for blazing a trail for the next generation, #42. #JackieRobinsonDay | #nats4good
